thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com
thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text: So the only thing I would do differently, is not order on a Saturday, when the following Monday is a holiday. POV says they don't ship on weekends, nor on Federal holidays, which is clearly listed on their website, so I had no issue when it shipped on Tuesday, and arrived early on Thursday. Fast/Discreet shipping, the free grinder is top quality (nice and heavy, grinds well, 4 chamber w/ kif scraper), air tight container is well made, and the free glass mouth piece with my V2 Pro was the kicker for me. Over $60 in free products, for a vape that cost $79.95. As for the vape, slow rip, keep filling those lungs, great cloud production, and excellent flavor for about 75% of the session, last couple may have "burnt popcorn" taste expected in this range. All in all, i highly recommend this as a single session, personal at-home or on the go vape.
